revision.text:
'''Raynor's Tale''' is a [[ZDoom]] mod being created by Tomi "Lu-Wang" Rajala, and produced by [[Team Future]] (I think?). It will take place in a western setting, and features voice acting.
See [http://wip.paci-fist.org/index.php?a=listwads&wad=1 here] for screenshots of Raynor's Tale Part 1. [[category:Abandoned ZDoom Projects]]
